original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ /
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasya ārāme mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham ardha trayodaśabhiḥ bhikṣu śataiḥ

original: tatra bhagavānāmantrayate sma - pratītyasamutpādasya vo bhikṣavaḥ ādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi vibhaṅgaṃ ca /
analyzed: tatra bhagavān āmantrayate sma pratītyasamutpādasya vaḥ bhikṣavaḥ ādim vaḥ deśayiṣyāmi vibhaṅgam ca

original: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta, bhāṣiṣye -
analyzed: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye
yat uta asmin sati idam bhavati
jāti pratyayāḥ jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti

original: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
analyzed: evam asya kevalasya mahataḥ duḥkha skandhasya samudayaḥ bhavati
avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ iti avidyā katamā
kuśala akuśaleṣu sāvadya anavadyeṣu sevitavya asevitavyeṣu hīna praṇīta kṛṣṇa śukla sa pratibhāga pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu ajñānam
ṣaṭsu vā punar sparśa āyataneṣu yathā bhūta tā
yat atra tatra yathā bhūtasya ajñānam

original: trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ - kāyasaṃskārāḥ vāksaṃskārāḥ manaḥsaṃskārā iti //
analyzed: trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ kāya saṃskārāḥ vāc saṃskārāḥ manaḥ saṃskārāḥ iti
saṃskāra pratyayam vijñānam iti vijñānam katamat
ṣaṭ vijñānakāyāḥ cakṣuḥ vijñānam śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ vijñānam
vijñāna pratyayam nāma rūpam iti nāma katamat
vedanā skandhaḥ saṃjñā skandhaḥ saṃskāra skandhaḥ vijñāna skandhaḥ

original: catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya itīdaṃ ca nāma,
analyzed: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni upādāya iti idam ca nāma
tat aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya nāma rūpam iti ucyate
nāma rūpa pratyayam ṣaṣ āyatanam iti ṣaṣ āyatanam katamat
cakṣuḥ ādhyātmikam āyatanam śrota ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ ādhyātmikam āyatanam
ṣaṣ āyatana pratyayaḥ sparśaḥ iti sparśaḥ katamaḥ
cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ
sparśa pratyayā vedanā iti vedanā katamā
vedanā pratyayā tṛṣṇā iti tṛṣṇā katamā
kāma tṛṣṇā rūpa tṛṣṇā arūpya tṛṣṇā ca
tṛṣṇā pratyayam upādānam iti upādānam katamat
kāma upādānam dṛṣṭi upādānam śīla vrata upādānam ātma vāda upādānam
upādāna pratyayaḥ bhavaḥ iti bhavaḥ katamaḥ
kāma bhavaḥ rūpa bhavaḥ arūpya bhavaḥ
bhava pratyayā jātiḥ iti jātiḥ katamā

original: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ saṃjātiravakrāntirabhirvṛttiḥ
analyzed: yā teṣām teṣām sattvānām tasmin tasmin sattva nikāye jātiḥ saṃjātiḥ avakrāntiḥ abhirvṛttiḥ
prādurbhāvaḥ skandha pratilambhaḥ dhātu pratilambhaḥ āyatana pratilambhaḥ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ
jāti pratyayam jarā maraṇam iti jarā katamā

original: yattat khālatyaṃ pālityaṃ valīpracuratā jīrṇatā bhugnatā kubjagopānasīvaṅkatā tilakālakācitagātratā
analyzed: yat tat khālatyam pālityam valī pracura tā jīrṇa tā bhugna tā kubja gopānasī vaṅka tā tilaka alaka ācita gātra tā

original: khuapraśvāsakāyatā purataḥ prāgbhārakāyatā daṇḍaviṣkambhaṇatā dhandhatvaṃ mandatvaḥ
analyzed: khuapraśvāsakāya tā puratas prāgbhārakāya tā daṇḍa viṣkambhaṇa tā dhandha tvam manda tvaḥ

original: hāniḥ parihāṇiḥ indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvaḥ jarjarībhāvaḥ /
analyzed: hāniḥ parihāṇiḥ indriyāṇām paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇām purāṇībhāvaḥ jarjarībhāvaḥ

original: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāttasmāt sattvanikāyāt cyutiḥ cyavanato bhedaḥ antarahāṇiḥ āyuṣo hāṇiḥ uṣmaṇo hāṇiḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ  #
analyzed: yā teṣām teṣām sattvānām tasmāt tasmāt sattva nikāyāt cyutiḥ cyavanataḥ bhedaḥ antara hāṇiḥ āyuṣaḥ hāṇiḥ uṣmaṇaḥ hāṇiḥ jīvita indriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānām

original: idaṃ ca maraṇa pūrvikā ca jarā,
analyzed: idam ca maraṇa pūrvikā ca jarā
tat ubhayam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya jarāmaraṇam iti ucyate

original: pratītyasamutpādasyādiṃ vo deśayiṣyāmi iti vibhaṅgaṃ ca iti vo yaduktam,
analyzed: pratītyasamutpādasya ādim vaḥ deśayiṣyāmi iti vibhaṅgam ca iti vaḥ yat uktam
ātta manasaḥ te bhikṣavaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan
pratītyasamutpāda ādi vibhaṅga nirdeśa sūtram samāptam
